description: [Play](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1040) has used tools including [Wevtutil](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0645) to remove malicious files from compromised hosts.(Citation: Trend Micro Ransomware Spotlight Play July 2023)

external_references.description: Trend Micro Research. (2023, July 21). Ransomware Spotlight: Play. Retrieved September 24, 2024.
external_references.source_name: Trend Micro Ransomware Spotlight Play July 2023
